gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve the default columns set for the issue navigator so that I can ensure the visibility of important fields for my team.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of default columns currently configured for the issue navigator, including their IDs, names, and visibility status.

gold.user: As a system administrator, I need to update the default columns in the issue navigator to reflect the new workflow requirements, ensuring my team has access to the most relevant information.
gold.ideal: The API should accept a JSON payload with the new column configurations and return a success message indicating that the default columns have been updated successfully.
